Uses of ContentChange in edu.bonn.cs.wmp.awarenesswidgets
 

Subclasses of ContentChange in edu.bonn.cs.wmp.awarenesswidgets
 class LineChange
          This content change type shall be used for propagating line lenght changes from a WMPEditText to a RadarView.
 class ViewportChange
          This change type is used to tell a RadarView about the new viewport position of a specific user.
